Name: Twinstick Arcade
About the game: This game contains flashing lights and light patterns that may cause photosensitive people to experience epileptic seizures or loss of consciousness. Consult your doctor prior to playing. Certain flashing effects can be disabled in the main menu. Blast and dash through in a gorgeous retro 2D world! Explore and fight your way out of the arcade machine. Endless mode throws wave after wave at you to see how long you can last. Play hard! Escape from the arcade machine! Speedrun through tight combat encounters. Improve your high-scores. And most of all: tolerate the colour green. Seven intricate maze-like levels to explore! Dozens of unique combat encounters! Take on challenging enemies as you fight your way out! You were poking around an old arcade in town when BOOM: you were sucked into the arcade machine! You'll need to fight your way out of the machine using nothing but your wits and a puny pistol. Will you be able to claw your way out of this retro world? Or will you remain trapped inside it forever?
